description:
Local Nephilim attempts to brighten everyone's Christmas under the misguidance of Austrian Phoenix.

Original stream

Relive those memorable hololive English moments…now in 3D!
Look out for a new re-enactment every other Friday.

title: Hope Lights The Way #holoEN3DRepeat
